    • Constructor Detail

      • Queen

        public Queen​(int row,
             int col,
             boolean isWhite)
        Constructor to initialize row, column and team. Sets type to 'Q'.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the piece.
        col - The column of the piece.
        isWhite - The piece's team: true if white, false if black.

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public ChessPiece copy()
        Queen implementation of abstract method for a ChessPiece to return a copy of itself.
        Specified by:
        copy in class ChessPiece
        Returns:
        A copied instance of the invoking Queen.

      • canAttack

        public boolean canAttack​(int newRow,
                         int newCol,
                         Board board)
        Queen implementation of abstract method to check if a move to the new coordinate is valid. Doesn't account for checks.
        Specified by:
        canAttack in class ChessPiece
        Parameters:
        newRow - The row of the new coordinate.
        newCol - The column of the new coordinate.
        board - The chess board.
        Returns:
        True if valid, false if not.
